name: Kashin
headline: Credit for the emerging economy in Latam
description:
Credit for the emerging economy in Latam.
We have 10K users and nearly $2M in annualized revenue, from our small loans to micro-merchants and individuals in the informal economy.
We do our underwriting with our proprietary AI risk model processing 250+ variables from the user's smartphone and credit bureau.

founders.name: Christophe Robilliard, Founder
founders.description:
Engineer with a passion for solving problems.
Former experiences: McKinsey Consultant, Easy Taxi General Manager, Cabify Regional Manager, and Ligo COO.
Love sports: surf, tennis, soccer, squash, and more.

founders.name: Jose Palacios, Founder
founders.description: Founder and Critical Thinking Officer @ Kashin

generated_description:
### Kashin: Empowering Financial Access in Latin America

Founded in 2020 and based in Lima, Peru, **Kashin** is a fintech company on a mission to provide accessible credit for emerging economies in Latin America. The startup emerged from the Y Combinator S22 batch and has quickly grown to serve over **10,000 users** while generating nearly **$2 million** in annualized revenue. This growth is largely driven by its focus on small loans targeted at micro-merchants and individuals operating within the informal economy.

Kashin's lending model relies on an innovative proprietary **AI risk assessment platform** that evaluates more than **250 variables** drawn from user smartphones and credit bureau data. This allows them to offer loans ranging from **S/50 to S/800**, ensuring that applicants receive the exact amount they request, with transparency and no hidden fees. A key component of their service is the commitment to user privacy‚Äîunlike many traditional lenders, Kashin has a **zero harassment policy**, pledging never to contact users' personal connections.

With a team of **45 employees**, led by Group Partner **Dalton Caldwell**, Kashin's growth and customer satisfaction are evidenced by the platform's impressive ratings, such as a **4.9 on Google Play**. The company aims not just to lend but to educate its users about financial management through its blog and FAQs, offering insights into topics like credit scoring and responsible borrowing.

Kashin operates with full legal compliance, registered with the **Superintendence of Banking and Insurance** in Peru, which assures customers that they are engaging with a legitimate, secure financial institution. 

As they continue to expand their reach, Kashin is committed to making fast, reliable credit available to underserved populations in Peru and potentially beyond, embodying the spirit of financial technology that is designed to uplift and empower the informal sector.

Explore Kashin‚Äôs offerings or reach out for assistance through their [website](https://kashin.app/). Whether you‚Äôre in need of a quick loan or just looking to learn more about personal finance, Kashin is here to support your journey.
